duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute category strategies for national brand supplier partnerships in the healthcare sector.
Lead contract negotiations with suppliers and drive supplier relationship management.
Leverage data and analytics to negotiate contracts for goods and services, ensuring fiscal expectations are met or exceeded.
Drive strategy, negotiation prioritization, and performance management for supplier KPIs.
Identify and propose creative solutions for supplier value and incremental dollars, accelerating negotiations.
Strengthen key relationships, drive accountability for supplier KPI performance, and enforce contract compliance.
Recommend new practices, processes, and metrics to achieve specific strategic sourcing goals.
Build strong, trusting internal and external relationships and mentor less experienced colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business preferred or equivalent work experience.
